title: Blood Trail:
description: Humiliated and left to die by a band of ruthless outlaws, Travis is saved by a man even harder than those who nearly killed him. Now, his hunt for his own brother becomes a questâ€¦and the man who saved him shows him that a blood trail is the easiest to follow! And he must follow it to the end. His end, or his brother's.
author: John Legg
